cause.description:
This cause is to raise awareness and money to save Pitbulls because they are a breed that is getting litterally people are being Racist about and that is not cool Pitbulls are NOT bad dogs I have owned many of them and my sisters Dog Trinity is the shit I miss my dogs and Iknow they miss me because all dogs can Bite ALL OF THEM and its NOT THE DOG ITS THE OWNER
1. Good Training for Dogs
2. No Abusive Owners
3. GIVE THE PIT BULLS A CHANSE
cause.mission: Bring out the Good Name of the Pitbulls
cause.name: Save the Pitbulls
